Class GlobalComponentRegistry

java.lang.Object
org.infinispan.factories.AbstractComponentRegistry
org.infinispan.factories.GlobalComponentRegistry
All Implemented Interfaces:
Lifecycle
@ThreadSafe public class GlobalComponentRegistry extends AbstractComponentRegistry
A global component registry where shared components are stored.
Since:
4.0
Author:
Manik Surtani

    • rewire

      public void rewire()
      Description copied from class: AbstractComponentRegistry
      Rewires components. Used to rewire components in the CR if a cache has been stopped (moved to state TERMINATED), which would (almost) empty the registry of components. Rewiring will re-inject all dependencies so that the cache can be started again.
      Overrides:
      rewire in class AbstractComponentRegistry

    • ensureComponentRunning

      public <T> void ensureComponentRunning(Class<T> type)
      Ensures the given component is in a running state.

      This will guarantee that the requested component has all dependencies injected and have run all methods annotated with Start.

      Type Parameters:
      T - The component type.
      Parameters:
      type - The class of the component to verify.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - If the component does not enter into a running state.
